pages.title: Welcome to Benvenuti's KB Pizza Crust Company
pages.description: With over 20 years of experience, we provide quality pizza dough, self-rising par-baked, and the new open-cell panbake deep dish crusts to the amateur to the experienced pizza maker alike.

pages.title: About Us | Benvenuti's KB Pizza Crust Company
pages.description: KB Pizza prides itself on over 20 years of quality and excellence. Our product capabilities range from raw pizza dough, to self-rising par-baked, and the new open-cell panbake deep dish crust. The new crusts are used by many pizza stores to serve their customers faster.

contacts.address: There is no stopping KB Pizza. Your dream pizza product can easily be made into reality. Just call the number on the contact page, or write or email your questions to the addresses provided.

pages.title: Our Products | Benvenuti's KB Pizza Crust Company
pages.description: Our product capabilities range from raw pizza dough, to self-rising par-baked, and the new open-cell panbake deep dish crust. The new crusts are used by many pizza stores to serve their customers faster. Call us for more information on how we can help you make a better pizza.

pages.title: Sheeted Dough | Benvenuti's KB Pizza Crust Company
pages.description: KB Pizza Self Rising is a sheeted and proofed self-rising dough. Handled frozen, it requires no proofing or thawing before baking. After removing product from freezer, just apply your favorite ingredients and bake. It's that simple.
pages.text_preview: Sheeted Dough | Benvenuti's KB Pizza Crust Company Benvenuti's KB Pizza Crust Company Toll Free 888-522-7878 Home About Us Products Sheeted Dough Dough Balls Par-Baked Crust Employment Contact Search Sheeted Dough KB Pizza Self Rising is a sheeted and proofed self-rising dough. Handled frozen, it requires no proofing or thawing before baking. After removing product from freezer, just apply your favorite ingredients and bake. It’s that simple. Self Rising is ideal for customers who prefer the fla

pages.title: Dough Balls | Benvenuti's KB Pizza Crust Company
pages.description: KB Pizza dough balls are made from a high-gluten flour. Dough balls offer quality and consistency without the expense of owning and maintaining dough-mixing equipment.
pages.text_preview: Dough Balls | Benvenuti's KB Pizza Crust Company Benvenuti's KB Pizza Crust Company Toll Free 888-522-7878 Home About Us Products Sheeted Dough Dough Balls Par-Baked Crust Employment Contact Search Dough Balls KB Pizza dough balls are made from a high-gluten flour. The ingredients create a fluffy outer edge, and a moist texture that allows them to be easily stretched into various shapes and sizes. Dough balls offer quality and consistency without the expense of owning and maintaining dough-mixin

pages.title: Par-Baked Crust | Benvenuti's KB Pizza Crust Company
pages.description: Unlike most pizza crusts, KB Pizza's par-baked crusts are handmade. Our lengthy aging process ensures a consistent taste and texture. KB Pizza's par-baked crusts are shipped ready to use.
pages.text_preview: Par-Baked Crust | Benvenuti's KB Pizza Crust Company Benvenuti's KB Pizza Crust Company Toll Free 888-522-7878 Home About Us Products Sheeted Dough Dough Balls Par-Baked Crust Employment Contact Search Par-Baked Crust Unlike most pizza crusts, KB Pizza’s par-baked crusts are handmade. Our lengthy aging process ensures a consistent taste and texture. The two sides can be easily recognized, even by the most inexperienced pizza maker. Crevices are evident on the rough bottom, while the topping side

pages.title: Employment | Benvenuti's KB Pizza Crust Company
pages.description: Thank you for your interest in Benvenuti's KB Pizza Company. You may apply for positions using our online application form and attach your resume for us to review.
pages.text_preview: Employment | Benvenuti's KB Pizza Crust Company Benvenuti's KB Pizza Crust Company Toll Free 888-522-7878 Home About Us Products Sheeted Dough Dough Balls Par-Baked Crust Employment Contact Search Employment Employment Download an employment application and mail to 191 Howard Street Franklin, PA 16323. You can also submit an application online and attach a resume. All fields marked with * are required. If we are interested in your application, we will call you for an interview. Thank you. Employ
